data.comment: Atletico Mineiro kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 2, Atletico Mineiro drive upfield and Keno gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Botafogo defender.
Botafogo's Pedro Raul gets in a shot on goal at Independencia. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Belo Horizonte, Atletico Mineiro push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 4, Atletico Mineiro have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 6, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Botafogo.
Botafogo are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
In the minute 8, Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Botafogo's half.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Botafogo.
Atletico Mineiro push upfield and Igor Rabello gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Botafogo defence.
Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Botafogo at Independencia.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
Goal! Jefferson Savarino heads Atletico Mineiro into a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 17, Keno instrumental with a fine assist.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
In the minute 21, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Botafogo.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Botafogo.
In the minute 23, Atletico Mineiro's Jefferson Savarino has been booked in Belo Horizonte.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Botafogo.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a throw-in for Atletico Mineiro, close to Botafogo's area.
Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 28, Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Botafogo in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
Igor Rabello returns to the field for Atletico Mineiro after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 31, Igor Rabello is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In Belo Horizonte Atletico Mineiro drive forward through Hyoran. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 34, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Atletico Mineiro's Jefferson Savarino misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Independencia.
In the minute 35, Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Botafogo advance rapidly upfield but Savio Pereira Sampaio blows for offside.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Junior Alonso for Atletico Mineiro has been booked by Savio Pereira Sampaio and receives a first yellow card.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 38, Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Botafogo's half.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Junior Alonso (Atletico Mineiro) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 42, Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Atletico Mineiro's Bueno is back in action after a slight knock.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Botafogo.
In the minute 45, At Independencia the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Atletico Mineiro are whistled for offside.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Botafogo.
The first-half is over.
Savio Pereira Sampaio waits before resuming play because Bueno for Atletico Mineiro is still down.
Kevin (Botafogo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
It's Botafogo with the kick-off after the break.
In the minute 46, Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
The away team replace Carlos Renteria with Salomon Kalou.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 48, Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Botafogo.
In the minute 50, Eduardo Sasha scores with a header and the home team increase their lead to 2-0.
That's a fine assist from Jefferson Savarino.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 52, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Botafogo.
The away team have replaced Kevin with Keisuke Honda. This is the second substitution made today by Ramon Diaz.
Marcelo Benevenuto keeps Botafogoâ€™s hopes alive with a headed strike to make it 2-1.
Great play from Marcinho to set up the goal.
In the minute 54, Botafogo's Salomon Kalou has run offside.
Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Botafogo.
In the minute 57, Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
Jefferson Savarino of Atletico Mineiro smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 58, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Atletico Mineiro's Hyoran breaks free at Independencia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 60, Botafogo have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Botafogo throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
Salomon Kalou for Botafogo is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Botafogo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 65, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Federico Zaracho.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jorge Sampaoli (Atletico Mineiro) has taken off Federico Zaracho who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Talison Ruan Da Silva is the replacement.
In the minute 67, Atletico Mineiro make their second substitution with Marrony replacing Nathan.
Marcinho for Botafogo drives towards goal at Independencia. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 68, Throw-in high up the field for Botafogo in Belo Horizonte.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 70, Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Botafogo.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
In the minute 75, Wesley is replacing Calebe for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
Matheus Nascimento de Paula is on a sub for Pedro Raul for Botafogo.
In the minute 76, Ramon Diaz is making the team's fourth substitution at Independencia with Rhuan replacing Warley.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 80, Keno (Atletico Mineiro) had a chance from the penalty spot but missed!
Eber Bessa is replacing Rafael Forster for the away team.
Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 81, Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
At Independencia, Marcinho has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in for Botafogo at Independencia.
In the minute 84, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Botafogo.
Atletico Mineiro needs to be cautious. Botafogo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 86, Can Botafogo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atletico Mineiro's half?
Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 88, Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
Kanu (Botafogo) gets a yellow card.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Belo Horizonte.
Botafogo are coming forward and Matheus Nascimento de Paula gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Botafogo in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a throw-in for Atletico Mineiro, close to Botafogo's area.
Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Botafogo's half?
The match has come to a close in Belo Horizonte. The final score is 2-1.
Jorge Sampaoli (Atletico Mineiro) is making a fourth substitution, with Gustavo Henrique replacing Eduardo Sasha.
